name: Cardio machines
description: A range of machines, all designed to help you burn calories and increase your heart rate.

name: Weights
description: Weight training boosts metabolism, promotes better bone health, and reduces your risk of inflammation.

name: Showers
description: Showers are a great way to end after working up a sweat and is available to all adults

name: Group Fitness Studio
description: A studio space for group fitness classes such as yoga, Pilates, Zumba, and spinning.

name: Pools
description: You can get in some low-impact swimming workouts while cooling yourself down.

name: Basketball Courts
description: Playing basketball is a great way to get in some cardiovascular exercise

name: Massage Therapy
description: Massage is a great way to decrease DOMS and potentially decrease recovery times from intense workouts

name: Sauna and Steam Room
description: A relaxation area with a dry sauna and a steam room for post-workout recovery.
